item.title: Dominique Pelicot has been jailed for 20 years after drugging his ex-wife Gisèle and recruiting strangers to rape her for years. Fifty other men were sentenced alongside him in Avignon, France. #GiselePelicot #France #Trial #Crime #Court #News #BBCNews
